alert.note: Alert for North Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 12:29PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Cass County through 100 PM CDT... At 1228 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woman Lake, or 13 miles southeast of Walker, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wabedo and Longville around 1245 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Boy Lake, Whipholt, Webb Lake and Inguadona. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
